title: Azerbaijan Hosts Event Celebrating Ancient Chinese Mathematician Liu Hui
description: Azerbaijan, on December 9, hosted an event celebrating the birth anniversary of Liu Hui, a renowned mathematician from China's Wei and Jin Dynasties, as part of a commemorative program jointly organized by the China Association for Science and Technology (CAST)

title: Ancient Pompeii construction site reveals the process for creating Roman concrete | CNN
description: Excavations of an ancient construction site in Pompeii have revealed the process of how Romans mixed their self-healing concrete.

title: Ancient Pompeii construction site reveals the process for creating Roman concrete
description: Excavations of an ancient construction site in Pompeii have revealed the process of how Romans mixed their self-healing concrete.

title: Ancient poetry reveals India’s Deccan grasslands are not wastelands but timeless savannas
description: Savanna Research: Discover how ancient texts reveal the Deccan's grasslands as timeless savannas, not wastelands, reshaping conservation views.

title: These Linguists Are Creating a New Dictionary of Ancient Celtic Languages—With Help From 'Curse Tablets' and Roman Records
description: The project aims to produce a record of the Celtic languages spoken in Britain and Ireland, though the majority of these words have already been lost to history
